name: renative-wrapper
description: ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€ Build universal cross-platform apps with React Native. Includes latest `iOS`, `tvOS`, `Android`, `Android TV`, `Android Wear`, `Web`, `Tizen TV`, `Tizen Watch`, `Tizen Mobile`, `LG webOS`, `macOS/OSX`, `Windows`, `KaiOS`, `FirefoxOS`, `Firefox TV` and `Chromecast` platforms

scripts.bootstrap: yarn run link:rnv && yarn run link:rnv-builder && npx lerna bootstrap && yarn build
scripts.bootstrap-clean: rm -rf ./node_modules; npx lerna clean --yes && yarn bootstrap
scripts.link:rnv: cd packages/rnv && (yarn unlink || true) && yarn link
scripts.link:rnv-builder: cd packages/rnv-builder && (yarn unlink || true) && yarn link
scripts.git-commit: cd packages/app && rnv hooks run -x gitCommit
scripts.git-tag: cd packages/app && rnv hooks run -x gitTag
scripts.git-commit-tag: cd packages/app && rnv hooks run -x gitCommitAndTag
scripts.deploy-website: cd website && GIT_USER=pavjacko CURRENT_BRANCH=master USE_SSH=true yarn publish-gh-pages
scripts.deploy-all: npm run test:rnv:unit && npm run deploy-prepare && npm run deploy-website && npm run git-commit-tag
scripts.deploy:feat: npm run test:rnv:unit && npm run deploy-prepare && npm run git-commit && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag feat --yes
scripts.deploy:alpha: npm run deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --dist-tag alpha --yes && git push origin HEAD
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy-all && npx lerna publish from-package --yes && git push origin HEAD

title: ReNative
